page.title: 02HISTORY IN LONGNEWTON
page.content: LONGNEWTON DATES BACK TO{1206}.THE LONDONDERRY ARMS IS A PUB IN LONGNEWTON.MR DYSON IS THE{LANDLORD. IT WAS NAMED AFTER THE{LONDONDERRY {FAMILY. THE PUB WAS ORIGINALLY A RESTING PARLOUR FOR{LADY LONDONDERRY. THERE WERE SEVEN MARQUESS' OF LONDONDERRY.SOME OF THEM ARE BURIED IN THE CHURCH VAULT IN LONGNEWTON AND SOME ARE BURIED IN WYNYARD CHAPEL. THE VANE ARMS IS ANOTHER PUB IN LONGNEWTON.IT IS NAMED AFTER A MEMBER OF THE{VANE FAMILY}WHO WAS A MARQUESS OF LONDONDERRY. THE CHURCH IN LONGNEWTON WAS BUILT IN THE{12th CENTURY}BUT BURNT DOWN AND REBUILT AGAIN IN{1871}.IT HAS A LONDONDERRY CHAPEL WHICH HAS SOME PLAQUES ABOUT THE LONDONDERRY FAMILY.
